# DEBIAN INSTALLATION ON GNUBEE-PC1

# Using root from a terminal, run:
cd
wget --no-check-certificate gnubee-git.github.io/debian/debian-jessie-install
chmod +x  debian-jessie-install
./debian-jessie-install

user : root 
password : GnuBee

# After booting into Debian, install modules:
cd
wget gnubee-git.github.io/debian/debian-modules-install
chmod +x  debian-modules-install
./debian-modules-install
